name: Sudoku+
description:
Sudoku+ by Brainium is the classic Sudoku game you know and love for your Mac.

Enjoy a clear, easy to read Sudoku board with visual guides that make glancing at the possibilities a breeze.

Our input system is designed to make entering solutions and notes magically simple with your choice of mouse or keyboard controls and our friendly scoring system allows you to compete with yourself or your friends regardless of skill level.

Sudoku by Brainium is the most beautiful and user-friendly Sudoku game you've ever played before.

Features:
✮ Five perfectly balanced difficulty levels
✮ Endless collection of masterfully crafted puzzles
✮ Game statistics to keep track of your progress
✮ The only Sudoku on Mac with Full Screen and window resizing freedom
✮ Unlimited Undo/Redo
✮ Auto-Clear Notes Option
✮ Auto Error-Checking Option
✮ Automatic save and resume
✮ Advanced game options, notes & hint system
✮ Five gorgeous themes
✮ Sensible keyboard shortcut keys for all game operations
✮ OneTouch system for magically simple number entry with your mouse
✮ Challenge friends via email
✮ Accept challenges from your friends posted from iPhone and iPad
✮ Leader boards

We hope you enjoy Sudoku by Brainium, and don't hesitate to send us your questions and suggestions to:
support@BrainiumStudios.com

Sudoku by Brainium is also available on iPad and iPhone as a universal App for your on the go puzzle pleasure!
